abstract: Returns the name for the persistent store file inside the document’s file package.
overview:
## Return Value

The name for the persistent store file inside the document’s file package.

## Discussion

This path component is appended to the document URL provided by [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument]. The default name is `persistentStore`.

# persistentStoreName

**Type Property**

Returns the name for the persistent store file inside the document’s file package.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var persistentStoreName: String { get }
```

## Return Value

The name for the persistent store file inside the document’s file package.

## Discussion

This path component is appended to the document URL provided by [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument]. The default name is `persistentStore`.
title: persistentStoreName
